features: MIRROR SIZE - Set of 4 frameless real glass mirrors, each mirror tile is 12 x 12 inch. Advanced polishing technology makes safe and delicate edges
HIGH-QUALITY - Frameless mirror tiles are made of HD float glass, frosted edge protects well your hands

DIY FREE DISPLAY - Can be combined as you wish, whatever square, rectangle or in other shapes, to make your home more elegant and warm. Perfect for door mirror, body mirror, Gym mirror, dance mirror and home décor

EASY INSTALLATION - Package coming with powerful double sided foam tape. It can be easily installed on smooth walls, latex paint walls, light-hole tiled wall furniture or wooden doors, but not for wallpaper, blistering wall, ash-falling wall, moistured wall, uneven wall. After fixed, do not move at will
100% SATISFACTION SERVICE - In case any problem or you are not satisfied, please tell us without hesitation, we will try our best to solve your problem

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Jiolong - Our mirror tile line in the Ruomeng collection, which brings customers excellent experience with its excellent quality. In Ruomeng, our goal is to bring customers better home experience and improve the quality of life. We know it's important to feel good about what you buy, so imagine how wonderful it is when you look in our mirror and see yourself at your most beautiful.

HD Imaging Ruomeng mirror was made of high quality float glass which can provide super HD imaging, beautiful, natural and no distortion. Saving Space Package coming with powerful double sided foam tape. It can be easily installed on smooth walls, latex paint walls, light-hole tiled wall furniture or wooden doors. Frosted Edge Frosted mirror edge, not hurting your hand. The edge of frameless mirror is processed through multiple polishing, matte side has a delicate and sleek aesthetic.
Suitable Wall Latex Paint Wall Tiles Wood Door/Wall Smooth Glass
Unsuitable Wall Ash-falling Wall Brick Wall Uneven Surface Wallpaper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used all the sticky things to put up, so far holding great. Put the stickies on the edge not middle. The pieces bow just enough to not stick if it's in the middle of the back of the mirror. Not noticable when looking at the mirror. May be my wall isn't perfectly flat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as Described
reviews.reviewText: I had broken my hanging door mirror and was looking to replace it. I found the door mirrors to be a bit expensive and ended up buying these as an alternative. They did not disappoint!. The mirrors are true to size and I can see reflections clearly. I did notice some peoples reviews mentioned warping, but I took advice to put a small space in between each and it worked perfectly, no warping. They are also easy to install, although I used two sided mounting tape that I already had, they come with adhesive pieces. Easy to clean (I just used an ordinary dry towel). All in all im happy with my purchase and I would highly recommend these mirrors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good for the price. One is damaged, so I only got 11, instead of 12 mirrors. Also the edges are perfectly straight so treat it like a puzzle piece when putting them up (check which edges will fit best against the adjacent piece) otherwise you'll have some gaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value exceeds the price!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect such beautiful mirrors! Easy to hang, light weight, perfectly clear image! I recommend this product & the seller! Probably going to get another set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I'm a high school student at a boarding school and I didn't have a full-length mirror to look at my bomb outfits with, so I did a lil online shopping and came across this (mainly cuz it was the cheapest option I could find and we rly do be living the broke life T-T). I looked at a lot of the reviews and saw that some ppl were iffy on the stickies that were provided to stick the mirror onto walls, but I went ahead with the purchase anyway and I don't regret it. Istg if I spent any more than $30 on a full-length mirror my parents would put me in a coffin, but I didn't, so I got away with this purchase with a light scolding (just some context, I didn't tell my parents I was buying this but I got my own card so ahaha). A bunch of the other mirrors I saw were hella expensive, like who wants to spend over $90 on a mirror?? Not me. This arrived pretty quickly and nothing was broken so that's good. I was so excited when I got this package cuz no one sends me anything :( but that's beside the point. I was a little nervous about sticking this on my dorm room walls because my walls are like the textured bumpy ones with little dents and stuff, like the wall isn't smooth. But I put the little stickies in a 3 by 3 pattern (I hope that makes sense??) and then I js stuck it on my wall. I made sure to press extra hard on the areas where the stickies were just in case the mirrors fell but the mirrors haven't fallen so the stickies seem to be working pretty well. There were some scratches on the mirror itself, but they're rly rly faint and small, I could only see them if I put my face really close to the mirror. But at that point, my face was too close to the mirror and I saw all my pores and stuff and I got grossed out and back away. Overall, I give these mirrors a 10/10!! If you're a broke high school student like me (or a human that doesn't want to spend a lot of money on expensive mirrors), this is a great option :D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for home gym
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these for my mini home gym, specifically for monitoring form, and these were awful for that purpose. My overall image was completely distorted from mirror to mirror, and I’ve learned that any split in mirror, but especially lower quality mirrors will completely distort the overall look. Individually, these could pass for say a quick makeup touch up or hair adjustment, even a general accent on a wall they’d be great, but for a full body need in a workout room, even fitted right together, is a big fat no. So for accent or display and not full and continuous use these would work fine. I can’t even return them though because once I measured and got them all up and perfect, only then realizing how awful they were all together, it took a flat scraper to gently lift each piece from the wall with the included double sided adhesives, and they all broke in some place. Cracked into a ton of pieces and damaged the wall in some areas. Useless mess and a waste of money. If you’re unsure about these, use one small piece of the double sided tape and put them all up before committing to the full adhesive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great as long as you put them on perfectly and never need to remove them
reviews.reviewText: These were very easy to install but if they are not perfectly adhered to the wall and right next to each other, there will be some distortion. This happened to me so I tried to remove one of them and it shattered. I ended up having to just remove all of them and ended up damaging my wall in several places. I would not recommend these if you are renting your place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and easy
reviews.reviewText: So easy to put up!! I used additional wall tape to make sure they stay on.
It cracked as I was putting it on and ruined my wall trying to remove it, not to mentioned how careful I had to be not you have cuts all over my hands… very disappointed

La primera vez compré dos paquetes, desafortunadamente uno venía incompleto pero Amazon me resolvió el problema. Al reembolsar el producto.Después compré un paquete más y todo salió bien. Llego completo. Fuera de ese detalle que se resolvió perfecto, todo de maravilla.

The media could not be loaded. Just installed this today. It’s very easy to install. It comes nicely packaged and with its own double sided tape.I used my own double sided tape. The mirrors are light and easy to install and looks like a mirror.Will update once we’ve had more use.
Il est juste ça que je cherchais pour ma chambre
